cashier.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone whose job is to receive or pay out money in a shop
cashier.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to force an officer to leave the army, navy etc because they have done something wrong
cashier.translation[2].definitions[0].de: someone whose job is to take and pay out money in a shop, bank, hotel etc
cashier.translation[2].definitions[1].de: someone who is responsible for keeping an account of the money received by and paid out by a bank or company
cashier.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: The petty cash book, receipts and vouchers are presented to the head cashier, who audits them.
